SALERETURNS.label: Sale Returns
SALERETURNS.description: Raise claims for SKUs returned by customers during secondary due to damage, defects or other issues.

PURCHASERETURNS.label: Purchase Returns
PURCHASERETURNS.description: Raise claims for purchased stock that is unsellable.

ALLEXCLTOV.label: All Excl. Tov
ALLEXCLTOV.description: Raise claims for all types of secondary schemes (except Total order value discount)
